<!-- These resources are around just to allow their values to be customized
     for different hardware and product builds. -->
<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">

    <!-- The limit browser search:for cmcc case, user input string limit -->
    <integer name="max_input_browser_search_limit">2000</integer>

    <!-- CMCC MM package name-->
    <string name="config_mm_package_name">com.aspire.mm</string>

    <!-- default year for first power on-->
    <integer name="default_restore_year">2015</integer>

    <!-- Flag indicating whether ntp sync over mobile data connection -->
    <bool name="config_ntp_by_mobile">false</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher captitial portal check is enabled for mobile data connection -->
    <bool name="is_captive_over_mobile">false</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi framework stop scan after screen off -->
    <bool name="config_wifi_framework_stop_scan_after_screen_off_support">true</bool>

    <!-- Integer indicating the delay in milliseconds for wifi framework stop scan after screen off, set to zero means no support-->
    <integer name="config_wifi_framework_stop_scan_after_screen_off_delay">720000</integer>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi scanner screen on & connected back off scan enable -->
    <bool name="config_wifi_scanner_backoff_scan_when_connected_support">true</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi scanner screen on & connected back off scan check throughput enable -->
    <bool name="config_wifi_scanner_backoff_scan_check_throughput_support">true</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi framework enable IpReachabilityMonitor -->
    <bool name="config_enable_ip_reachability_monitor">true</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi framework enable IpReachabilityMonitor Enhancement-->
    <bool name="config_enable_ip_reachability_monitor_enhancement">true</bool>

    <!-- Wifi supports UTF8-like GBK encoding -->
    <bool name="config_wifi_utf8_like_gbk_encoding">false</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher wifi supportes STA mode set frequency band -->
    <bool name="config_wifi_sta_setband_support">false</bool>

    <!-- Display toast time when Wifi Display quality is bad -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_toast_time">20</integer>

    <!-- Display notification time when Wifi Display quality is bad -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_notification_time">60</integer>

    <!--   Wifi display: default resolution -->
    <!--     0: 720p,30fps (Menu is disabled)  -->
    <!--     1: 1080p,30fps(Menu is disabled)  -->
    <!--     2: 1080p,30fps(Menu is enabled)  -->
    <!--     3: 720p,30fps (Menu is enabled) -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_default_resolution">-1</integer>

    <!-- Wifi display: gallery power saving option   -->
    <!--   0: off -->
    <!--   1: dim -->
    <!--   2: no power saving -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_power_saving_option">1</integer>

    <!-- Wifi display: gallery power saving delay. The unit is second -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_power_saving_delay">10</integer>

    <!-- Wifi display: secure option -->
    <!-- 0: TV shows black. -->
    <!-- 1: TV shows prohibitted image -->
    <integer name="wfd_display_secure_option">1</integer>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher always enable mobile hotspot when it is plugged in to a wall socket, or to a computer, for charging -->
    <bool name="is_mobile_hotspot_always_on_while_plugged">false</bool>

    <!-- Flag indicating wheteher  -->
    <bool name="is_mobile_provision_enabled">false</bool>

    <!-- Skip network validation. In some environment like China can't connect to
         http://clients3.google.com/generate_204    -->
    <bool name="config_skip_network_validation">false</bool>

    <!-- Safe headphone fm volume index. -->
    <integer name="config_safe_fm_volume_index">12</integer>

    <!-- PLMN list for DTAG dual APN -->
    <string-array translatable="false" name="dtag_dual_apn_plmn_list">
        <item>26201</item>
        <item>21901</item>
        <item>23203</item>
        <item>22603</item>
        <item>22606</item>
        <item>20201</item>
        <item>23001</item>
    </string-array>

    <!-- To support Mediatek AAL ultra dimming, all Android public interface accepts
         virtual brightness values of backlight instead of physical values.
         If all brightness configurations are also virtual values, set this flag to
         true. Otherwise, they are traditional physical values and no conversion will
         be performed.
    -->
    <bool name="config_screenBrightnessVirtualValues">false</bool>

    <!-- Package name(s) containing Location Provider, which is
         supported by LBS vendors. -->
    <string-array name="config_cnLocationProviderPackageNames" translatable="false">
        <item>com.baidu.map.location</item>
    </string-array>

    <!-- Operator list for supporting OMH -->
    <string-array translatable="false" name="operator_support_omh_list">
        <item>40589</item>
        <item>40400</item>
        <item>42103</item>
    </string-array>

        <item>android.intent.action.ACTION_BOOT_IPO</item>
    </string-array>
